title: Henry IV, Parts One and Two
description: No Fear Shakespeare gives you the complete text of Henry IV Part One and Two on the left-hand page, side-by-side with an easy-to-understand translation on the right.Each No Fear Shakespeare contains:* The complete text of the original play* A line-by-line translation that puts Shakespeare into everyday language* A complete list of characters with descriptions* Plenty of helpful commentary
author: William Shakespeare
